item.title: [Leetcode] Pancake Sorting(Medium)
item.description: LeetCode 969 - Pancake Sorting Given an array of integers arr, sort the array by performing a series of pancake flips. In one pancake flip we do the following steps: Choose an integer k where 1 <= k <= arr.length. Reverse the sub-array arr[0...k-1] (0-indexed). For example, if arr = [3,2,1,4] and we performed a pancake flip choosing k = 3, we reverse the sub-array [3,2,1], so arr = [1,2,3,4]
